original_title: 遙かなる時空の中で3 終わりなき運命
overview: The war between the Heike clan and the Genji clan continues. This time, Nozomi has to fight a powerful supernatural enemy and make a choice: protect her friends and stay by Kurou's side, or choose her first love, Masaomi, which is the leader of the Heike, and her enemy.
title: Haruka - Beyond the Stream of Time 3: Endless Destiny
